> d1<-sample(6,10,replace = TRUE)
> d2<-sample(6,10,replace = TRUE)
> d_t<- d1+d2
> hist(d_t)
> d3<-sample(6,100,replace=TRUE)

> plot(n)
> hist(n)
> n<-rnorm(1000,u=5, mean=5, sd=10)

> hist(rnorm(1000,u=5, mean=5, sd=10))

> hist(rnorm(1000, mean=5, sd=10))
> ?rnorm
> a<-rnorm(1000, mean=70, sd=5)
> hist(a)
> ?hist
> hist(a, probability = 10)
> hist(a, probability = 100)
> hist(a, probability = 1)
> hist(a, probability = 10)
> hist(a, probability = 10
+ )
> hist(a, probability = 0)
> hist(a, probability = 100)
> ?rnorm
> pnorm(100, mean=70, sd=3.3)
[1] 1
